name: VR Coral Reef Underwater Scuba Diving
name_original: VR Coral Reef Underwater Scuba Diving
description:
Welcome to VR Coral Reef Underwater Scuba Diving! Enjoy scuba diving like never before in this exciting virtual reality experience! Here are some features of this simulation :

· Fully animated and realistic 3D models!

· Over 25 species of fish, and also seahorses!

· Realistic corals and high quality sound effects!

· High Definition Graphics with FULL HD quality!

· Compatible with all Cardboard VR Gearsets and similar SBS viewers (side by side)

Enjoy!

Designed and publshed by The Lonely Developer
